timeline.bodyText: So the error message will contain the key as the user submitted it?
timeline.author: eshryane

timeline.bodyText: Do you need to test the primary key in the test? It seems superfluous
timeline.author: eshryane

replies.bodyText: Its just a way to test that before delete key exists and after it does not. I can remove that if you prefer that
replies.author: maggarwal13

replies.bodyText: I don't think it's needed, and can be safely removed
replies.author: eshryane
